Rexed lamina VIII.CytoDefiningCriteria: Consists of rather heavily staining cells of all sizes from small to large ones and has a heterogeneous appearance.
Rexed lamina VIII.SuperCategory: Rexed spinal cord parcellation scheme region
Rexed lamina VIII.Definition: Lamina lying adjacent to lamina VII, located in the ventral or ventral medial gray matter.  Cells are slightly larger than those of lamina VII.  This lamina contains commissural cells (Paxinos The rat nervous system, 2nd ed., pg 44)
